title: JustCode Template List
content:
Using the new 4.4 Module builder I've started to make available a list of telerik [JustCode templates](https://www.telerik.com/products/justcode/code-templates.aspx).

First up: Sitefinity Custom Designer Script (contains samples)

**NOTE** JustCode Q3 2011 SP1 or greater required as they revamped their template engine.

[View Template](https://www.sitefinitysteve.com/downloads/templates)

\*\*EDIT\*\*

For those who don't know, JustCode is teleriks visual studio productivity addon.  It's included in your Ultimate Collection, and also I believe Premium Collection (or standalone license)...it's like teleriks version of CodeRush\\R#.   
[Feature Matrix](https://www.telerik.com/products/justcode/justcode-feature-matrix.aspx)

So this is a video of what the first template I added does:  

[View on youtube](https://youtu.be/zIQTRYCqEjk)

### Note 2020-09-24
Telerik discontinued the product a while ago, I recommend [DevXpress Coderush](https://www.devexpress.com/products/coderush/) instead.
seoDescription: Here are some Telerik JustCode Templates you can use in the Sitefinity 4.4 Module builder.
